interpretation:
The Red Question Mark is a symbol of uncertainty and confusion. It represents a time when you are seeking answers, but they are not yet clear. This card reminds you to be patient and trust that the answers will come in their own time. It may also signify a need for further research or exploration in order to gain clarity.

When this card appears in a reading, it can indicate a period of questioning or a decision that needs to be made. It is a reminder to look for the deeper meaning behind events and to trust your intuition. You may feel like you are at a crossroads and unsure of which path to take, but the Red Question Mark assures you that the answers are within you.

Overall, the Red Question Mark encourages you to embrace the unknown and trust in the journey. It reminds you that sometimes the greatest discoveries come from not knowing all the answers. Trust that the universe will guide you towards the truth.
